title: Colorado Donald Trump Supporter Burns Republican Party Registration
content:
Video of a fed up Trump supporter burning his Republican Party registration is heating up Twitter after conservative author and commentator Ann Coulter retweeted the video .
Due To CO Delegate Fraud . Larry Was A Trump Delegate ! pic.twitter.com/maRIML5qOr — Richard Weaving ( @ RichardWeaving ) April 10 , 2016
An earlier tweet suggested that the Trump supporter was a Trump delegate who had been replaced and removed in Colorado .
Breaking News : Colorado Trump Delegate Removed And Replaced !
Delegate Fraud In Full Swing ! pic.twitter.com/LsW5TzEvLj — Richard Weaving ( @ RichardWeaving ) April 10 , 2016
The man in the video , allegedly Larry Wayne Linsey , says he ’ s “ still fuming about what happened this morning down in Colorado Springs . ”
“ This is a copy of my Republican Party registration and Republican Party take note , I think you ’ re going to see a whole lot more of these , ” the man states as he lights his GOP registration on fire . “ I ’ ve been a Republican all my life , but I will never be a Republican again . ”
“ What do you think is going to happen when millions more like me do the exact same thing ? Good-bye GOP . I will not be forced to vote for somebody that I don ’ t want to , ” he adds . “ You ’ ve had it . You ’ re done . You ’ re toast . I quit the party . ”
“ I ’ ll be Independent and I ’ m voting for Trump and the hell with the Republican Party , ” he concludes .
This is happening all over our country—great people being disenfranchised by
politicians . Repub party is in trouble ! https : //t.co/wNXRqVl9Uu — Donald J. Trump ( @ realDonaldTrump ) April 11 , 2016
Larry Wayne Lindsey reacted to GOP frontrunner Donald Trump contacting him after his video went viral .
He posted on Facebook : “ I got a call from Donald Trump , himself ! What an amazing and gracious man , to take time out of his busy day , to call and thank me ! Thank you , Mr. Trump ! God bless you ! ”
content_original:
Video of a fed up Trump supporter burning his Republican Party registration is heating up Twitter after conservative author and commentator Ann Coulter retweeted the video.

GOP Lost Life Long Republican Larry Wayne Linsey

Due To CO Delegate Fraud. Larry Was A Trump Delegate ! pic.twitter.com/maRIML5qOr — Richard Weaving (@RichardWeaving) April 10, 2016

An earlier tweet suggested that the Trump supporter was a Trump delegate who had been replaced and removed in Colorado.

Breaking News : Colorado Trump Delegate Removed And Replaced !

Delegate Fraud In Full Swing ! pic.twitter.com/LsW5TzEvLj — Richard Weaving (@RichardWeaving) April 10, 2016

The man in the video, allegedly Larry Wayne Linsey, says he’s “still fuming about what happened this morning down in Colorado Springs.”

“This is a copy of my Republican Party registration and Republican Party take note, I think you’re going to see a whole lot more of these,” the man states as he lights his GOP registration on fire. “I’ve been a Republican all my life, but I will never be a Republican again.”

“What do you think is going to happen when millions more like me do the exact same thing? Good-bye GOP. I will not be forced to vote for somebody that I don’t want to,” he adds. “You’ve had it. You’re done. You’re toast. I quit the party.”

“I’ll be Independent and I’m voting for Trump and the hell with the Republican Party,” he concludes.

UPDATE:

Trump responds:

This is happening all over our country—great people being disenfranchised by

politicians. Repub party is in trouble! https://t.co/wNXRqVl9Uu — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) April 11, 2016

***UPDATE***

Larry Wayne Lindsey reacted to GOP frontrunner Donald Trump contacting him after his video went viral.

He posted on Facebook: “I got a call from Donald Trump, himself! What an amazing and gracious man, to take time out of his busy day, to call and thank me! Thank you, Mr. Trump! God bless you!”
